short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For the savvy Okta administrator. Extends and provides additional functionalities to the Okta Admin Dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imaginauts extends the Okta Dashboard with additional useful information and functionalities such as showing Group and User IDs conveniently on the corresponding pages and allowing for Push or SMS/Voice checks to be triggered right from the dashboard. The information and functionalities can be enabled and disabled at any time through the extension settings.
